send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page
